name: TalkQuest
description:
This is a tiny game where you can talk to a few different characters to progress the 'story'. It's real purpose is to test out a dialog system I made but I figured hey why not subject my stuff to the whims of the internet as well.

WASD to move around, space to interact/advance dialog.

Also, the entire project is on GitHub over here:

https://github.com/MutedFox/TalkQuest
